Name: Re: Collector
About the game: ■Plot I woke up in a mysterious forest. I had no idea who I was or why I was here. Then, I met some friends and went on an adventure... ■Game contents - Enemies you beat can join your party. - Fight all kinds of enemies in this fantasy RPG. But watch out! If you make the wrong call, something bad might happen... - Win at all costs and move on! - Don't let your enemies lure you in. Use special skills to keep a cool head. - The story is a pretty straightforward. You will be asked to make some decisions but it won't affect the story outcome. - No leveling up required to win. Enjoy the story without spending hours leveling up. - A simple battle system for RPG beginners! - Messages can be skipped - Orthodox turn-based battle RPG
